translation.de: ...dass Ihre Innereien sich auf dem Boden verteilen werden.

translation.en: Then I will grab them and place them on your chest.
translation.de: Dann lege ich sie Ihnen auf die Brust.

translation.en: And then I will place your hands over them like that.
translation.de: Und dann werde ich ihre Hände so darüberlegen.

translation.en: Something I like to call the Venezuelan embrace.
translation.de: Ich nenne das gern die venezolanische Umarmung.

translation.en: I am him.
-I am the Ghost. -I knew it.
So, what can I do for you?
translation.de: Also, was kann ich für Sie tun?

translation.en: [El Toro] Mm. You, my friend...
translation.de: Also, was kann ich für Sie tun? Sie, mein Freund...

translation.en: You are going to kill the president of Venezuela.
translation.de: Sie werden den Präsidenten von Venezuela umbringen.

translation.en: [El Toro] In two days, our so-called president
translation.de: In zwei Tagen feiert sich der Präsident,

translation.en: will throw himself an inauguration ball to celebrate his fifth unelected term.
translation.de: weil er zum fünften Mal ohne Wahlen Präsident wurde.

translation.en: And there, you will take his life.
translation.de: Und dort werden Sie ihn umbringen.

translation.en: And in doing so, you will send a message to the people
translation.de: Damit schicken Sie eine Botschaft an das Volk,

translation.en: that greed and corruption will not be tolerated.
translation.de: dass Gier und Korruption nicht toleriert werden.

translation.en: And that the revolution has begun.
I understand completely.
It just seems you've got quite a few resources here.
translation.de: Ich verstehe. Sie haben hier genug Männer, die das tun könnten.

translation.en: Wow, is that a 50 cal-- Yeah, that's a 50 cal.
translation.de: Wow, ist das eine Kaliber .50? Ja, ist es.

translation.en: Um, why not do it yourself?
Because not even I could reach the man in his palace.
translation.de: Weil ich nie zu ihm in den Palast käme.

translation.en: For that, I need someone with your unique talents.
translation.de: Dafür brauche ich jemanden mit Ihren Fähigkeiten.

translation.en: Right. First step would be reconnaissance.
Uh, I would need a vehicle and a map clearly indicating -where the nearest airport is located. -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.de: Ich bräuchte ein Fahrzeug und eine Karte, auf der der Flughafen eingezeichnet ist.

translation.en: Why would you need that?
Because once it's done...
translation.de: Weil mir, wenn es erledigt ist...

translation.en: um, I'll have less than 90 minutes to leave the country.
translation.de: ...weniger als 90 Minuten bleiben, um das Land zu verlassen.

translation.en: Out of the country?
-When it's done. -Ninety minutes.
Okay, you're right. You will need a car.
translation.de: Ok, Sie haben recht. Sie werden ein Auto brauchen.

translation.en: And a driver, my second in command.
[El Toro] Psst. Oye, drive him.
Nice to meet you.
You are not the Ghost.
-He is the Ghost, Juan. He's the Ghost. -He's not the Ghost.
translation.de: -Er ist der Geist, Juan. -Er ist nicht der Geist!

translation.en: And when I prove it...
I'm gonna kill him myself.
I must apologize for Juan.
He's a bit of a wet blanket. Good luck.
translation.de: Er ist manchmal eine Spaßbremse. Viel Glück.

translation.en: [Cleveland] That idiot is dead.
[agent] So incredibly dead.
Voice analysis is back.
Name's Samuel Larson.
He published a book claiming to be, get this... an international assassin.
translation.de: Er behauptet in seinem Buch, ein internationaler Killer zu sein.

translation.en: We should probably pull him out, put him on a plane home.
translation.de: Wir sollten ihn rausholen und nach Hause schicken.

translation.en: Why the hell would we do that?
Because we're the CIA.
-You almost got me. You almost got me. -You know I like messing with you, man.
translation.de: -Fast hattest du mich. -Ich verarsch dich einfach gerne.

translation.en: I didn't know where you were going with that.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, worauf du rauswillst.

translation.en: Bet you a Benji he's dead in less than 48.
translation.de: Wetten, er ist in weniger als 48 Stunden tot?

translation.en: Double he doesn't make it to breakfast.
translation.de: Das Doppelte, dass er vorm Frühstück tot ist.

translation.en: Yeah.
Come on. From here you do your reconnaissance.
translation.de: Kommen Sie schon. Von hier aus können Sie aufklären.

translation.en: So, I guess I should get started. Uh...
translation.de: Dann sollte ich wohl besser anfangen.

translation.en: So, I will see you in probably a few hours, I guess.
translation.de: Dann sehen wir uns in ein paar Stunden.

translation.en: Where you go, I follow.
Look. We seem to have gotten off on the wrong foot.
No, I'm on the right foot. The foot of you are not the Ghost.
translation.de: -Wir hatten einen schlechten Start. -Aber nein. Sie sind nicht der Geist.

translation.en: What makes you so sure?
The Ghost would never have been kidnapped so easily.
translation.de: Den Geist hätte man nie entführen können.

translation.en: That's a fair point. But you know, maybe I wanted to be kidnapped.
translation.de: Gutes Argument. Vielleicht wollte ich entführt werden.

translation.en: Or maybe you're a fraud. And a liar.
translation.de: Vielleicht sind Sie aber ein Betrüger. Und ein Lügner.

translation.en: And maybe I kill you right now.
translation.de: Vielleicht bringe ich Sie jetzt um.

translation.en: So, what is the Ghost gonna do?
That's a good question.
So?
What is the Ghost gonna do?
He's gonna pee. I got to pee.
translation.de: Er wird pissen. Ich muss pissen.

translation.en: -Around the corner, to the right. -Gotcha.
Open up.
Open up.
[Juan] Güero, open the door.
Damn.
-[Sam] They're gonna kill the president. -[detective] Who is?
Pro-dem guerrillas. El Toro.
-They tried to hire me. -They tried to hire you?
translation.de: -Sie wollten mich anheuern. -Die wollten Sie anheuern?

translation.en: Yeah, but not the real me.
translation.de: Nicht mein wahres Ich, das aus meinem Buch,

translation.en: The fake me from my book, True Memoirs of an International Assassin.
translation.de: Nicht mein wahres Ich, das aus meinem Buch, Die wahren Memoiren eines Internationalen Killers.

translation.en: If that is the fake you, then why does it say "true" in the title?
translation.de: Aber warum heißt es denn dann "wahre Memoiren"?

translation.en: -It's just to sell more books. -So, can you show me a copy?
translation.de: -Um mehr Bücher zu verkaufen. -Können Sie mir das Buch zeigen?

translation.en: [stammers] You got a computer?
translation.de: -Um mehr Bücher zu verkaufen. -Können Sie mir das Buch zeigen? Wo ist Ihr Computer?

translation.en: -The computer's not working today. -You don't have one working computer?
translation.de: -Der geht heute nicht. -Kein einziger Computer geht?

translation.en: -You don't have one copy of your book? -It's a virtual book.
translation.de: -Sie haben kein einziges Buch dabei? -Es ist virtuell.

translation.en: -Ah, then it's not a real book. -No, it's real. It's real, okay?
translation.de: -Dann ist es kein echtes Buch. -Doch, ist es.

translation.en: It's just online. It could be the next-- Do you know Twilight?
translation.de: Es ist nur online. Kennen Sie Twilight?

translation.en: -Oh, I know Twilight. -It could be the next Twilight...
translation.de: -Oh, ich kenne Twilight. -Es könnte das nächste Twilight sein.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Can you just take me to the embassy?
This doesn't look like the embassy. It's not the real embassy, no.
translation.de: -Das sieht nicht aus wie die Botschaft. -Das ist nicht die echte Botschaft, nein.

translation.en: [detective] You sit here.
-Make yourself comfortable. -[officer in Spanish] I'm calling him.
translation.de: -Machen Sie es sich bequem. -Ich rufe ihn an.

translation.en: He says El Toro hired him to kill the president.
translation.de: El Toro heuerte ihn an, um den Präsidenten zu töten.

translation.en: [in English] We--? We gonna be here long?
[in Spanish] Masovich wants to see him at his house in half an hour.
translation.de: Masovich will ihn in 30 Minuten sprechen.

translation.en: [in Spanish] He doesn't pay me well enough to be at his beck and call.
translation.de: Ich tanze nicht nach seiner Pfeife, dafür bezahlt er mir zu wenig.

translation.en: [officer] You want to tell him that?
We'll take him to Masovich.
But not before this gringo gives me a much-deserved bonus.
translation.de: Aber erst muss er mir einen Bonus zahlen.

translation.en: [in English] Okay.
You need to get me some money.
Some next-Twilight-sized money.
translation.de: So viel wie die Tantiemen für Twilight.

translation.en: -Yello. -[Sam over phone] Kylie. Hi, it's Sam.
Ghost with the most. What's the word?
-[Sam] I'm in Venezuela. -Sure you are.
[Kylie] I'm doing that eyebrow thing right now, BTdubs.
translation.de: Ich mache gerade das mit den Augenbrauen.

translation.en: I'm telling the truth.
Uh... I've been abducted. Twice.
translation.de: Man hat mich entführt. Zwei Mal.

translation.en: Oh, you are so method. I love it.
translation.de: Sie sind voll in Ihrer Rolle. Ich liebe es.

translation.en: Can't wait to find out what the Ghost does.
translation.de: Ich bin gespannt, was der Geist jetzt tut.

translation.en: Oh, got to go. That's me. I'm Curtis.
translation.de: Ich muss los. Das bin ich. Ich bin Curtis.

translation.en: Nothing, I--
-I got nothing. -No.
I need to hear about a large sum of money.
translation.de: Ich will was von einer großen Summe Geld hören.

translation.en: Or your face is going to be nothing
-in three, two, one-- -No. Come on, please. No, no, no.
translation.de: -Drei, zwei, eins... -Nein. Kommen Sie, bitte. Nicht.

translation.en: -Let's light this candle. -[detective] Whoa, what are you doing?
translation.de: -Zünden wir diese Kerze an. -Was tun Sie denn da?

translation.en: -What was that? -I didn't-- I don't know.
-[Sam] Ow! That hurt. Oh, that hurt. -This is going to hurt more.
translation.de: -Das tut weh. -Das wird noch mehr wehtun.

translation.en: [Sam] No. No, please, no.
Get a move on, cupcake.
I'm sorry. Who are you?
I've been trailing those cops for two weeks.
translation.de: Ich verfolge die Cops seit zwei Wochen.

translation.en: They're on the payroll for a heroin-smuggling Russian
translation.de: Sie stehen auf der Lohnliste eines Heroinschmugglers,

translation.en: named Anton Masovich.
Who's that?
A heroin-smuggling Russian-- Did you not hear what I said?
translation.de: Ein Russe, der Heroin... Hören Sie nicht zu?

translation.en: I'm sorry. Okay, look. Thank you for saving me.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Danke, dass Sie mich gerettet haben.

translation.en: I don't do this job for thanks. That's a good signature line.
translation.de: -Das machte ich nicht für ein Dankeschön. -Ein guter markanter Satz.

translation.en: Why does El Toro think you can kill the president?
translation.de: Warum denkt El Toro, Sie töten den Präsidenten?

translation.en: It's just a misunderstanding.
I'm a writer. I create characters.
translation.de: Ich bin Schriftsteller. Ich erschaffe Figuren.

translation.en: -This right here is not me. -What's your name?
My name is Sam.
translation.de: -Wie ist Ihr Name? -Mein Name ist Sam.

translation.en: [sighs] I'll tell you what, Sam and cheese.
-I'm gonna get you out of this. -Thank God. Thank you very much.
translation.de: -Ich werde Sie hier rausholen. -Gott sei Dank.

translation.en: You're gonna do me a favor first. Anything you need.
translation.de: -Erst tun Sie mir 'nen Gefallen. -Was Sie wollen.

translation.en: -Meet with Masovich. -That's not gonna happen.
Your friends there told Masovich that you would be at his place in 15.
translation.de: Ihre Freunde sagten Masovich, Sie sind in 15 Minuten bei ihm.

translation.en: If you don't show, he's gonna know something's up.
translation.de: Kommen Sie nicht, merkt er, was stimmt nicht.

translation.en: What does he want with me?
That's what you need to find out, honey baked.
[whispers] Honey baked?
It's that one with the huge gate. I'm not going in there. The one with the guards?
translation.de: -Es ist das Haus mit dem großen Tor. -Ich geh nicht rein. Das mit den Wachen?

translation.en: Is that a Doberman? They've got Dobermans walking around, no.
translation.de: Ist das ein Dobermann? Da laufen Dobermänner rum, nein.

translation.en: I'm not gonna be buried in Venezuela. I'm not going in.
translation.de: Ich werde nicht hier begraben. Ich gehe nicht rein.

translation.en: If I go in, I will be murdered in the face.
translation.de: Gehe ich da rein, legen die mich um!

translation.en: Look at me.
-Breathe. -I'm breathing.
Not like you're drowning.
Slow it down.
Breathe.
If Masovich wanted you dead,
he would have ordered those cops to execute you.
He didn't. They were going off-script when they started shaking you down for money.
translation.de: Hat er nicht, und dass die Geld wollten, gehörte nicht zum Plan.

translation.en: Find out Masovich's interest in El Toro and the president,
translation.de: Finden Sie raus, was er von El Toro und dem Präsidenten will,

translation.en: and I'll get you home safely.
translation.de: dann bringe ich Sie nach Hause.

translation.en: Masovich needs to believe you are an assassin.
translation.de: Masovich muss glauben, dass Sie ein Killer sind.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so gonna die. I'm so gonna die.
translation.de: Ich werde sterben. Auf jeden Fall.

translation.en: -[man speaking Spanish over intercom] -[in Spanish] Detective Garcia sent me.
I'm Anton Masovich.
Come outside.
It's a beautiful day.
How about a nice cold Zima?
You like?
They are fun girls, huh?
Yeah, I can tell by all the splashing.
translation.de: Ja, witzig, wie die da rumplanschen.

translation.en: When this is over, you can have whichever one you like.
translation.de: Wenn das vorbei ist, können Sie jede haben.

translation.en: What do you mean, when this is over?
[Anton on microphone] Take a seat.
How are you connected to El Toro?
translation.de: In welcher Verbindung stehen Sie zu El Toro?

translation.en: The truth.
El Toro wants me to kill the president.
translation.de: Ich soll für ihn den Präsidenten töten.

translation.en: He thinks I'm an international assassin.
translation.de: Er hält mich für einen Killer.

translation.en: -And? Are you? -No. Not even close.
[Paolo] I'm sorry, Mr. Masovich.
The Zima shipment was delayed.
translation.de: Die Zima-Lieferung ist noch nicht gekommen.

translation.en: I've brought you Smirnoff Ice. [Anton] Don't worry about it, Paolo.
translation.de: -Ich habe Ihnen Smirnoff Ice gebracht. -Keine Sorge deswegen, Paolo.

translation.en: Why they only sell Zima in Japan is beyond me.
translation.de: Warum man Zima nur in Japan verkauft, begreife ich nicht.

translation.en: Am I right?
You are. I mean, I just-- I totally agree.
translation.de: Ja. Dem stimme ich völlig zu.

translation.en: I mean, if you wanna be global, you've gotta be accessible.
translation.de: Will man global sein, muss man überall sein.

translation.en: You gotta be, you know, you gotta be able to reach out, Paolo.
translation.de: Der Kunde muss an die Produkte rankommen, Paolo.

translation.en: I'm blessed to be kept swimming, most of the time.
translation.de: Ich habe das Glück, mich die meiste Zeit betrinken zu können.

translation.en: El Toro is a terrorist who's brainwashed his followers.
translation.de: El Toro ist ein Terrorist, der Anhänger manipuliert.

translation.en: He's a major concern to my business interests in this country.
translation.de: Er ist ein Riesenproblem für meine Geschäfte in diesem Land.

translation.en: I've tried to flip his men in the past, but they'd rather die on the sword.
translation.de: Ich versuchte, seine Leute zu kriegen, aber die sterben lieber durchs Schwert.

translation.en: What about you?
-What about me? -Do you wanna die on the sword?
No, no, no.
I don't want to die on the sword, or, like, on anything else.
translation.de: Ich will nicht sterben, weder durchs Schwert noch sonst wie.

translation.en: -I don't-- -Wonderful.
Then you kill him for me.
I'm sorry, what?
Kill El Toro.
He trusts you,
-so, you can get close to him. -Yeah, but I'm not an assassin.
translation.de: -Sie kommen nah an ihn ran. -Ich bin kein Killer.

translation.en: So you keep saying. But you clearly have the skills.
translation.de: Das sagen Sie. Aber Sie haben die Fähigkeiten.

translation.en: You disabled Detective Garcia, and you came here.
translation.de: Sie machten Detective Garcia kampfunfähig und kamen her.

translation.en: Which suggests to me that you are sure of yourself.
translation.de: Ich gehe also davon aus, dass Sie selbstsicher sind.

translation.en: I promise, I'm not sure of myself. When they ask paper or plastic,
translation.de: Das bin ich nicht, fragt man mich "mit Milch und Zucker?",

translation.en: I'm even like, "Whatever's easiest for you," you know?
translation.de: sage ich: "Was für Sie einfacher ist."

translation.en: -[speaking Spanish] ¿No habla inglés? -Yeah, your modesty doesn't fool me.
I'll give you a choice.
You can use your unique position for evil
translation.de: Sie können Ihre einzigartige Position für Böses nutzen,

translation.en: by killing the president, starting a war, and bringing this country to its knees...
translation.de: indem Sie den Präsidenten töten, der 'nen Krieg startet, das Land ruiniert,

translation.en: or you use it for good.
For me.
-By killing El Toro. -[in English] I just wanna go home.
translation.de: -Indem Sie El Toro töten. -Ich will nach Hause.

translation.en: -How is everything, Mr. Masovich? -It's great.
translation.de: -Ist alles in Ordnung, Mr. Masovich? -Alles wunderbar.

translation.en: Paolo here has known me since I was five years old. Isn't that right?
translation.de: Paolo kennt mich, seit ich fünf bin. Stimmt's?

translation.en: It has been my pleasure to serve you and to watch you grow into a strong man.
translation.de: Es ist mir ein Vergnügen, Ihnen zu dienen, zu sehen, wie Sie zum Mann wurden.

translation.en: My father hired him when we came to this country almost 40 years ago.
translation.de: Mein Vater stellte ihn ein, als wir vor fast 40 Jahren hierherkamen.

translation.en: Wow, that is so nice.
But he should have restocked the Zima.
translation.de: Der Zima hätte ihm nicht ausgehen dürfen.

translation.en: I can find you in a second.
Don't let me down like Paolo.
translation.de: Enttäuschen Sie mich nicht wie Paolo.

translation.en: [agent] Oh, you're not gonna believe this.
-Is that Masovich's place? -You know what this means?
translation.de: -Ist das Masovichs Haus? -Weißt du, was das heißt?

translation.en: -Double down on our bet? -Well, yeah.
But also, if he's met with two of the three kings of Caracas,
translation.de: Aber auch, dass, wenn er zwei der drei Könige von Caracas trifft,

translation.en: we should probably tell the third.
translation.de: wir es wohl dem Dritten sagen sollten.

translation.en: And I should probably download his book.
translation.de: Und ich sollte mir wohl sein Buch runterladen.

translation.en: You forget about me, bacon bits?
So, Masovich must have had a chat with you
translation.de: Masovich muss mit Ihnen geplaudert und gesagt haben, Sie dürfen ausreisen.

translation.en: and said you could leave the country. No strings attached.
translation.de: Masovich muss mit Ihnen geplaudert und gesagt haben, Sie dürfen ausreisen. -Na ja, vielleicht eine. -Ja, ich weiß.

translation.en: -Yeah, maybe one string. -Yeah, I know.
-I heard the whole thing. -Yeah? Well, I'm getting out of here.
translation.de: -Ich habe alles gehört. -Ja? Tja, ich verschwinde.

translation.en: I just saw a man get murdered, actually, in the face.
translation.de: Ich sah gerade, wie ein Mann ermordet wurde.

translation.en: -So, I'm going to the embassy. -Go ahead.
I promise you, you go in there, you will die.
translation.de: Aber wenn Sie da reingehen, sterben Sie.

translation.en: The guy's got eyes everywhere.
Even here.
[Rosa] He wants you to kill El Toro.
translation.de: Er will, dass Sie El Toro töten.

translation.en: This is good.
But this is insane.
I'm not an assassin. Now I've got two contracts. Two. How is this good?
translation.de: Ich bin kein Killer und hab zwei Aufträge! Was ist daran gut?

translation.en: Because it confirms Anton Masovich is protecting the president.
translation.de: Es bestätigt, dass Anton Masovich den Präsidenten beschützt.

translation.en: All I have to do is prove it. And then I can have them both extradited.
translation.de: Ich muss es nur beweisen. Dann kann ich beide ausliefern lassen.

translation.en: The president's all about the high life,
translation.de: Dem Präsidenten geht's ums süße Leben,

translation.en: which Masovich is obviously financing with his drug business.
translation.de: das ihm Masovich mit seinen Drogengeschäften finanziert.

translation.en: Look, if El Toro wants you to take out--
translation.de: Hören Sie, wenn El Toro will, dass Sie...

translation.en: Take out the president, why don't you help him do it?
Because, McRib, my job is to uphold the law, not break it.
translation.de: Weil ich, McRib, das Gesetz schütze, nicht breche.

translation.en: Do me a favor. Can you stop with the names?
translation.de: Tun Sie mir einen Gefallen, keine Spitznamen.

translation.en: Sorry, I didn't know you were that sensitive.
translation.de: Sie sind sensibel. Ja, ich bin sensibel, was den Tod angeht.

translation.en: Yes. I am sensitive.
translation.de: Ja, ich bin sensibel, was den Tod angeht.

translation.en: To dying. I'm different that way. My mother would be like,
translation.de: Ja, ich bin sensibel, was den Tod angeht. Ich bin eigen. Mutter sagte:

translation.en: "Why are you scared of death?" I don't know. I guess I'm allergic.
translation.de: "Warum hast du Angst vor dem Tod?" Ich muss allergisch sein.

translation.en: It turns out I'm allergic. I'm allergic to death.
translation.de: Ich bin allergisch gegen den Tod.

translation.en: I understand. This is a scary place.
translation.de: Ich verstehe. Dieser Ort kann einem Angst machen.

translation.en: But if you wanna make it home alive, you've gotta get out of your head,
translation.de: Aber wenn Sie lebend heimkehren wollen, müssen Sie raus aus Ihrem Kopf

translation.en: and get in the game.
[in Spanish] He is here.
This guy has the attention of El Toro and Masovich?
translation.de: Für diesen Kerl interessieren sich El Toro und Masovich?

translation.en: Well, it seems that way, Mike.
Cut that Mike shit right now, slick.
It's either my real name or el presidente.
translation.de: Sondern bei meinem richtigen Namen oder el presidente.

translation.en: Relax, Miguel.
We all know you grew up in San Diego.
translation.de: Wir wissen, du bist in San Diego aufgewachsen.

translation.en: Maybe Masovich and El Toro believe this guy actually is legit.
translation.de: Vielleicht glauben Masovich und El Toro, dass der Kerl echt ist.

translation.en: -Well, is he? -No.
-Look at him. -[Cueto] Mm-hm.
Well, we don't know that for certain.
[Ruiz] I will interrogate this Sam Larson.
translation.de: Ich werde diesen Sam Larson befragen.

translation.en: It is, after all, a matter of national security.
translation.de: Schließlich geht es um die nationale Sicherheit.

translation.en: Sí, sí. Have General Ruiz talk to him.
translation.de: Si, si. General Ruiz soll mit ihm reden.

translation.en: Fine. But don't make any other moves.
translation.de: Schön. Aber sonst unternehmt ihr nichts.

translation.en: We've all worked way too hard to maintain the balance of power in this dump.
translation.de: Wir haben zu hart dafür gearbeitet, das Gleichgewicht im Kaff zu bewahren.

translation.en: Dump?
Yeah. Dump.
Come on, Mike. You hate this place as much as we do.
translation.de: Dir gefällt es hier so wenig wie uns.

translation.en: I know, I know. But do you have to keep reminding me?
translation.de: Ich weiß, aber musst du mich immer daran erinnern?

translation.en: Yes.
This is the address to my safe house.
translation.de: Die Adresse von meinem sicheren Unterschlupf.

translation.en: -I'll pick you up tomorrow. -Tomorrow?
Don't even think about going out. Masovich owns half the cops,
translation.de: Gehen Sie nicht raus. Die Hälfte der Cops arbeitet für Masovich.

translation.en: and controls the airport. You can't risk being seen.
translation.de: Er kontrolliert den Flughafen. Niemand darf Sie sehen.

translation.en: Yeah, but you've got backup, right?
I'm a one-woman operation.
I gotta believe the U.S. government knew what was happening--
CIA wants to maintain the status quo. Nothing more.
translation.de: Die CIA will den Status quo behalten. Sonst nichts.

translation.en: I learned my first year down here that if I wanna do any good, I have to do it myself.
translation.de: Das lernte ich im ersten Jahr: Will ich was Gutes tun, muss ich es tun.

translation.en: Sounds kind of lonely.
[Juan] Don't worry.
It's on me.
Your gun. Now.
You're coming with me, Ghost.
-Juan, I'm sorry about locking you out. -Move.
translation.de: -Tut mir leid, dass ich Sie aussperrte. -Gehen Sie weiter.

translation.en: What if I don't?
-I said move. -Already moving.
[Rosa] Let's go.
I don't like to fight women.
I can see why.
Get in the game!
You and I aren't done yet.
Looks like we are.
You follow us and you die.

Just call General Ruiz.
Where are we going? Back to El Toro's.

-That's not true. -It is.
You are a man of words, not of action.

translation.en: -It tickled. -No, no, no. I'm sorry, I saw your eyes,
translation.de: -Es hat gekitzelt. -Ich habe Ihre Augen gesehen.

translation.en: they got all glassy, like you were about to cry.

translation.en: -[in Spanish accent] "Like a small child." -I'll spank you like a small child.
translation.de: Die waren glasig, als wollten Sie weinen. "Wie ein kleines Kind." Ich versohle Ihnen den Hintern.

Oh... Maybe I am the Ghost--
God! Really?
Oh, man.
Now it is your eyes that are glassy.
What is it?
-[Juan] The army. -The army's bad?
When you're a rebel trying to overthrow the government,
translation.de: Für einen Rebellen, der die Regierung stürzen will,

translation.en: it doesn't get much worse.
-Come on. -All right.
-[Juan] We wait here till night falls. -But that's your truck across the street.
translation.de: -Wir warten bis zum Einbruch der Nacht. -Aber gegenüber steht Ihr Truck.

translation.en: If they see us, they'll shoot us.
They find us here, they'll shoot us here. We gotta go to the truck.

translation.en: -Not a good idea. -Come on, Juan. -Get out of your head, get in the game. -Hey!

translation.en: -El baño, can I--? -[shushes]
[in English] Don't talk.
What is your involvement...
with El Toro...
and Anton Masovich?

I wasn't gonna do it, by the way. I would never--

translation.en: -It took El Toro long enough. -Excuse me?

translation.en: Let me guess.
He wanted you to do it at the inauguration ball.

translation.en: Yes.
-So cliché. [chuckles] -I thought so, too.
-It felt a little on the nose, you know? -Listen.
Mason, Ghost, whatever your name is.

translation.en: -Sam. My name is Sam. -Sam.
I had a tiny cat named Sam.

translation.en: That would be a kitten. -In the States, we call it a kitten. -Kitten.
Thank you.
Listen, Sam.
Forget all those offers.
The president needs you to help him take out Masovich.

translation.en: Masovich? I would have thought... El Toro-- I'm just lost.

If El Toro needs you, then he clearly can't get to the president on his own.

translation.en: Yeah. [sighs]
I just wanna go home.
And I will get you home, if you do this.

I really don't want to, so...
Then you will be tried and executed
for plotting to assassinate the president of Venezuela.

I'm happy to hear that. What is your plan?

Really? Same place you were going to kill the president?

Afghan arms dealer never made it home from the state dinner.

Why would an actual assassin write a book about being an assassin?

not directly.
[Anton] Traitor!

I want him to die a long, painful death.

translation.en: Damn!
All right. Whole night's ruined.
[agent] That's just--
-Something is wrong with you. -[agent] I know.
-[Cleveland] In the head. -[agent] It's not even...
How did you get here? Did anyone spot you?

I could've done that myself.
I opened it for you. It's not a big thing.

-How did you get a meeting with him? -How I get most of my meetings here.

Guess who he wants me to eliminate at the inauguration ball.

-Bingo-vich. -[Rosa chuckles]

[Rosa] Come on.
No!

Those guys were cops. Masovich owns this city.

I'll wear a wire.
No, you were right. It's too dangerous. We gotta get you out of here.

translation.en: -Mission's over. -Mission is not over.
-The Ghost doesn't just walk away. -You are not the Ghost.

Sam, we almost died tonight. We're all gonna die.

translation.en: Tell El Toro the Ghost is here.

The one and only.

DEA, idealist, patriot.

translation.en: -You know? Yeah. -Seems very nice.
[groans] My shoulder, man! I got shot.
[in English] I have thousands of followers all over Venezuela,

translation.en: but I cannot think of anybody as beautiful as you.

You see? What did I tell you?
That's right, Juan.
The plan is in motion.
Tomorrow I'll be in position to take out el presidente.

-Anton Masovich is trying to kill us. -The Russian Moby?
-Yeah. -Screw him.
If you want me to take out the president, I need your men to keep us alive.

translation.en: -Anything for you, friend. -Yeah.
-Anything. -All right.
Anything for you. Come.

translation.en: [speaking Spanish] Mi casa es su casa.
We got our small army. Let's get you ready for the ball, Cinderella.

translation.en: No one's gonna be able to bring a weapon into the palace, so...

translation.en: if you can steal one of these from the presidential guard, use it.

-You're a good shot. -I've spent time at the range.

translation.en: Don't get me wrong. You're good, but you're not as good as me.

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Yeah, really.
Why don't you try this on?
Okay, that's really cool.
-But not practical. -No, you could use that in the field.
-Bullshit. -I used it in my book.
-Sam, what we're about to do is-- -I know.

translation.en: -It's not a book. -Let's just call it a night.
Wait a second.
-You're worried about me. -No.
Yeah.
That's why you're a one-woman operation.
Why you push people away with the nicknames.

translation.en: If you're on your own, you don't have to worry about losing anyone.

translation.en: You can't get hurt.
How did you know?
I'm a writer.
I notice the details.

translation.en: I'm really sorry.

translation.en: You're messing with me, aren't you?
Thought you noticed the details.

translation.en: [sighs] You are good.

[in Spanish] As requested.

[man] They disappeared into the jungle.

translation.en: I pay you a lot of money, and you have failed me again.
translation.de: Ich zahle euch einen Haufen Geld, ihr habt mich schon wieder enttäuscht.

[in English] Let's get a move on, cupcake.
From my private collection.
Listen, I know you don't need the luck.

The president's leg. Then, his other leg.

Whatever works for you. Until next we meet.

I opened it for you. It's not a big thing.
Stay close to them. Let me know when it is done.

[Rosa on recording] Testing, testing. Uno, dos, tres.

translation.en: -Is that all? -Don't get killed.
-Like my other five partners. -You were messing with me.

Locate the president, and meet back here before you make contact.

translation.en: I trust all is proceeding to plan.
translation.de: Ich vertraue darauf, dass alles nach Plan läuft.

So clumsy of me.
I think I've had one too many. Thank you, my friend.

Thank you.
[Juan] I'll take that, sir.
Juan. How did you get in?
-I'm more capable than El Toro thinks. -I'm glad you're here, man.

translation.en: -I'm freaking out. -You will kill the president tonight.

And then I'll kill you.
Come on, man. Oh, come on now. Kylie.
